mapper.insert: insert into vacation(code, start, end, content, period, type, employee_id) values(#{code}, #{start}, #{end}, #{content}, #{period}, #{type}, #{employeeId})
mapper.select: select idx, code, start, end, content, period, type, approval_status, use_status, application_date, employee_id, rejection_content from vacation where idx = #{idx}

select idx, code, start, end, content, period, type, approval_status, use_status, application_date, employee_id, rejection_content from vacation where employee_id = #{employeeId} and DATEDIFF(start, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) > 0

select idx, code, start, end, content, period, type, approval_status, use_status, application_date, employee_id, rejection_content from vacation where employee_id = #{employeeId} and approval_status = 'A' and DATEDIFF(start, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) < 1

select idx, code, start, end, content, period, type, approval_status, use_status, application_date, employee_id, rejection_content from vacation where approval_status = 'A' and -7 < TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, start, CURDATE()) and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, start, CURDATE()) < 7
